verses.verse: <S%H1945>Woe<s%> to <S%H740>Ariel,<s%> to <S%H740>Ariel,<s%> the <S%H7151>city<s%> where <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H2583>dwelled!<s%> <S%H5595>add<s%> you <S%H8141>year<s%> to <S%H8141>year;<s%> let them <S%H5362>kill<s%> <S%H2282>sacrifices.<s%>
Yet I will <S%H6693>distress<s%> <S%H740>Ariel,<s%> and there shall be <S%H8386>heaviness<s%> and <S%H592>sorrow:<s%> and it shall be to me as <S%H740>Ariel.<s%>

And I will <S%H2583>camp<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you <S%H1754>round<s%> about, and will lay <S%H6696>siege<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you with a <S%H4674>mount,<s%> and I will <S%H6965>raise<s%> <S%H4694>forts<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you.

And you shall be <S%H8213>brought<s%> <S%H8213>down,<s%> and shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> out of the <S%H776>ground,<s%> and your <S%H565>speech<s%> shall be <S%H7817>low<s%> out of the <S%H6083>dust,<s%> and your <S%H6963>voice<s%> shall be, as of one that has a familiar <S%H178>spirit,<s%> out of the <S%H776>ground,<s%> and your <S%H565>speech<s%> shall <S%H6850>whisper<s%> out of the <S%H6083>dust.<s%>

Moreover the <S%H1995>multitude<s%> of your <S%H2114>strangers<s%> shall be like <S%H1851>small<s%> <S%H80>dust,<s%> and the <S%H1995>multitude<s%> of the <S%H6184>terrible<s%> ones shall be as <S%H4671>chaff<s%> that <S%H5674>passes<s%> away: yes, it shall be at an <S%H6621>instant<s%> <S%H6597>suddenly.<s%>

You shall be <S%H6485>visited<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> with <S%H7482>thunder,<s%> and with <S%H7494>earthquake,<s%> and <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6963>noise,<s%> with <S%H5492>storm<s%> and <S%H5591>tempest,<s%> and the <S%H3851>flame<s%> of <S%H398>devouring<s%> <S%H784>fire.<s%>

And the <S%H1995>multitude<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that <S%H6633>fight<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H740>Ariel,<s%> even <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H6633>fight<s%> against her and her <S%H4685>fortification,<s%> and that <S%H6693>distress<s%> her, shall be as a <S%H2472>dream<s%> of a <S%H3915>night<s%> <S%H2377>vision.<s%>

It shall even be as <S%H834>when<s%> an <S%H7456>hungry<s%> man <S%H2492>dreams,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> he <S%H398>eats;<s%> but he <S%H6974>wakes,<s%> and his <S%H5315>soul<s%> is <S%H7385>empty:<s%> or as <S%H834>when<s%> a <S%H6771>thirsty<s%> man <S%H2492>dreams,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> he <S%H8354>drinks;<s%> but he <S%H6974>wakes,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> he is <S%H5889>faint,<s%> and his <S%H5315>soul<s%> has <S%H8264>appetite:<s%> <S%H3652>so<s%> shall the <S%H1995>multitude<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> be, that <S%H6633>fight<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion.<s%>

<S%H4102>Stay<s%> yourselves, and <S%H8539>wonder;<s%> <S%H8173>cry<s%> you out, and <S%H8173>cry:<s%> they are <S%H7937>drunken,<s%> but not with <S%H3196>wine;<s%> they <S%H5128>stagger,<s%> but not with strong <S%H7941>drink.<s%>

For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H5258>poured<s%> out on you the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H8639>deep<s%> <S%H8639>sleep,<s%> and has <S%H6105>closed<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes:<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> and your <S%H7218>rulers,<s%> the <S%H2374>seers<s%> has he <S%H3680>covered.<s%>

And the <S%H2380>vision<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> is <S%H1961>become<s%> to you as the <S%H1697>words<s%> of a <S%H5612>book<s%> that is <S%H2856>sealed,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> men <S%H5414>deliver<s%> to one that is <S%H3045>learned,<s%> <S%H5612><s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H7121>Read<s%> <S%H2088>this,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you: and he <S%H559>said,<s%> I <S%H3808>cannot;<s%> <S%H3201><s%> for it is <S%H2856>sealed:<s%>

And the <S%H5612>book<s%> is <S%H5414>delivered<s%> to him that is not <S%H3045>learned,<s%> <S%H5612><s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H7121>Read<s%> <S%H2088>this,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you: and he <S%H559>said,<s%> I am not <S%H3045>learned.<s%> <S%H5612><s%>

Why the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> For as <S%H3282>much<s%> <S%H365><s%> as <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> draw <S%H5066>near<s%> me with their <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and with their <S%H8193>lips<s%> do <S%H3513>honor<s%> me, but have <S%H7368>removed<s%> their <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H7368>far<s%> from me, and their <S%H3374>fear<s%> <S%H854>toward<s%> me is <S%H3925>taught<s%> by the <S%H4687>precept<s%> of <S%H582>men:<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore,<s%> <S%H2005>behold,<s%> I will <S%H3254>proceed<s%> to do a <S%H6381>marvelous<s%> <S%H6381>work<s%> among <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> even a <S%H6381>marvelous<s%> <S%H6381>work<s%> and a <S%H6382>wonder:<s%> for the <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> of their <S%H2450>wise<s%> men shall <S%H6>perish,<s%> and the <S%H998>understanding<s%> of their <S%H995>prudent<s%> men shall be <S%H5641>hid.<s%>

<S%H1945>Woe<s%> to them that seek <S%H6009>deep<s%> to <S%H5641>hide<s%> their <S%H6098>counsel<s%> from the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and their <S%H4639>works<s%> are in the <S%H4285>dark,<s%> and they <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> <S%H7200>sees<s%> us? and <S%H4310>who<s%> <S%H3045>knows<s%> us?

<S%H518>Surely<s%> your <S%H2017>turning<s%> of things upside down shall be <S%H2803>esteemed<s%> as the <S%H3335>potter's<s%> <S%H2563>clay:<s%> for shall the <S%H4639>work<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> of him that <S%H6213>made<s%> it, He <S%H6213>made<s%> me not? or shall the thing <S%H3336>framed<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> of him that <S%H3335>framed<s%> it, He had <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H995>understanding?<s%>

Is it not <S%H5750>yet<s%> a <S%H4213>very<s%> <S%H4592>little<s%> while, and <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> shall be <S%H7725>turned<s%> into a <S%H3759>fruitful<s%> field, and the <S%H3759>fruitful<s%> field shall be <S%H2803>esteemed<s%> as a <S%H3293>forest?<s%>

And in that <S%H3117>day<s%> shall the <S%H2795>deaf<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H5612>book,<s%> and the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H5787>blind<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> out of <S%H652>obscurity,<s%> and out of <S%H2822>darkness.<s%>

The <S%H6035>meek<s%> also shall <S%H3254>increase<s%> their <S%H8057>joy<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and the <S%H34>poor<s%> among <S%H120>men<s%> shall <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> in the <S%H6918>Holy<s%> One of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

For the <S%H6184>terrible<s%> one is <S%H656>brought<s%> to <S%H656>nothing,<s%> and the <S%H3887>scorner<s%> is <S%H3615>consumed,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H8245>watch<s%> for <S%H205>iniquity<s%> are <S%H3772>cut<s%> off:

That make a <S%H120>man<s%> an <S%H2398>offender<s%> for a <S%H1697>word,<s%> and lay a <S%H6983>snare<s%> for him that <S%H3198>reproves<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> and <S%H5186>turn<s%> <S%H5186>aside<s%> the <S%H6662>just<s%> for a thing of <S%H8414>nothing.<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H413>concerning<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> shall not <S%H6258>now<s%> be <S%H954>ashamed,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall his <S%H6440>face<s%> now wax <S%H2357>pale.<s%>

But <S%H3588>when<s%> he <S%H7200>sees<s%> his <S%H3206>children,<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of my <S%H3027>hands,<s%> in the <S%H7130>middle<s%> of him, they shall <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> my <S%H8034>name,<s%> and <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> the <S%H6918>Holy<s%> One of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and shall <S%H6206>fear<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
They also that <S%H8582>erred<s%> in <S%H7307>spirit<s%> shall <S%H3045>come<s%> to <S%H998>understanding,<s%> and they that <S%H7279>murmured<s%> shall <S%H3925>learn<s%> <S%H3948>doctrine.<s%>
